parameters.name: UT
parameters.description: Universal Time given in PDS format: yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss.sss.

parameters.name: P1
parameters.description:
P1: The first P-sensor sample of the magnetic
field in Magnetometer Sensor Coordinates (PVO_PTG). This is the               
component that lies nominally along the spacecraft spin axis direction. This  
is the first of 3 samples of this sensor and is the sample associated with    
the time stamp.

parameters.name: P2
parameters.description:
P2: The second P-sensor sample of the        
magnetic field in Magnetometer Sensor Coordinates (PVO_PTG). This is the      
component that lies nominally along the spacecraft spin axis direction. This  
is the second of 3 samples of this sensor and is taken 0.000038 seconds after 
the time stamp.

parameters.name: P3
parameters.description:
P3: The third P-sensor sample of the magnetic
field in Magnetometer Sensor Coordinates (PVO_PTG). This is the               
component that lies nominally along the spacecraft spin axis direction. This  
is the third of 3 samples of this sensor and is taken 0.000076 seconds after  
the time stamp.

parameters.name: BZ_SC
parameters.description:
BZ SC: The Z-component of the magnetic field 
in the PVO Inertial Spacecraft Coordinate System (PVO_ISCC). The Z axis is    
defined to be anti-parallel to the spacecraft spin axis during orbital        
operations.
